property.name: text
property.value: This model draws fuel at a constant rate from Tank1. When the level in Tank1 gets below 1/4 of its capacity, the model begins transferring fuel from Tank2 to Tank1 (while it continues to draw fuel from Tank1 at a constant rate).

property.name: text
property.value:
Definition ontologies for models.
[see Leung, Mandl, Lee, Latronico, Shelton, Tripakis, & Lickly, �Scalable Semantic Annotation using Lattice-based Ontologies,� MODELS 2009.]
